title: MNF Preview: Steelers-Bengals Picks, Props, Best Bets & DFS Advice (Football 12/21)
description:
Only two weeks of Monday Night Football remain in the 2020 NFL season. And while Steelers-Bengals isn't the sexiest possible matchup, Will Brinson and Larry Hartstein try to spice up the game by adding a gambling perspective. Pittsburgh is a two-touchdown favorite on the road going up against Ryan Finley. Is the pick that clear-cut though? The guys offer their sides on the spread and total as well props to target and DFS advice. 
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @LarryHartstein
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices

Pittsburgh is a two-touchdown favorite on the road going up against Ryan Finley. Is the pick that clear-cut though?
